dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Captain. We should chat.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Graham's got the right idea, but he isn't the right guy to execute it. I don't even think he's motivated by Philosophism anymore. I think he's just... guilt-ridden.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: I... can't believe I'm even saying this, but... I keep going over and over it in my head, and the only way I see the Iconoclasts surviving is... we depose him.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm with you there. Let's go talk to him.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: And you'd run it in his stead?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm not going against Graham.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Okay. Deep breaths. This is what's best, Zora. Time to save Monarch.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Yeah. Hell, most of our people listen to me already.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The Iconoclasts may take your orders, but most of them believe in him and his teachings.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: And what's next? What will you do when you're in charge?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Fair enough.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sometimes, you gotta do what's best for someone even if they think you're wrong. Even if it's painful. When we're in Stellar Bay... they'll come around.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Take Stellar Bay. Lick our wounds. Eventually figure out how the hell we're going to spread the word to the rest of the colony.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm going to confront him. Can I count on your support?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Yes. Let's go talk to him.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: It has to happen!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Fine. If you really think it's necessary.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Amber Heights was a long time ago. He's changed.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Graham's free to do what he thinks is right. Isn't that what this is all about?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm going to need some time to decide.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm not doing this, Zora.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: For the worse. I get him now. His guilt is so heavy that he's seeking absolution through Philosophism. It's become an obsession.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: But it isn't going to come. And in the meantime, our people need a real leader.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: You're right. And he's right. Don't get me wrong, Captain. I still believe in the message. The Iconoclast way is strong. But... right now, that's not enough.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: I get it. This is a tough decision. I won't act without you, but we're out of time. Once you give us that targeting module, I gotta prepare to march.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Dammit, Captain. I thought you and I were starting to see eye to eye.
